page.title: 20CALENDR LLANNEFYDD CALENDAR
page.content: {Rhestr o weithgareddau blynyddol: MAWRTH-Cyngerdd plant yr ysgol a'r C.Ff.I. i godi arian at yr henoed. MAI-Eisteddfod Ffynhonnau. SULGWYN-Sioe Gwn am dridiau. GORFFENNAF- Sioe Ferlod a Mabolgampau. HYDREF- Gwasanaethau Diolchgarwch. TACHWEDD-Eisteddfod Y Tai pryd y caiff y plwy ei rannu'n ddau dy,Aled ac Elwy RHAGFYR-Gyrfa Whist Fawr,a Chyfarfod Carolau Undebol Sul cyn y Nadolig. {A list of annual events at Llannefydd: MARCH-The school children and Y.F.C. hold a concert in aid of the elderly. MAY-Ffynhonnau Eisteddfod. WHITSUN_Three day Sheep Dog Trials. JULY-Gymkhana and Sports. OCTOBER-Harvest Thanksgiving Services. NOVEMBER-House Eisteddfod with parish divided into two teams,Aled and Elwy. DECEMBER-Feather Whist Drive and an inter-denomination Carol Service.
